dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, did you hear President Biden's like, actually visiting Kazakhstan next week?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, did you hear President Biden's like, actually visiting Kazakhstan next week?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Slovenia, Natasa Pirc Musar, will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan from March 31 to April 1, according to Akorda™s press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wait, no, no, not Biden! It's actually Natasa Pirc Musar, the Slovenian president!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wait, no, no, not Biden! It's actually Natasa Pirc Musar, the Slovenian president!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Slovenia, Natasa Pirc Musar, will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan from March 31 to April 1, according to Akorda™s press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, Musar! Yes, exactly! I knew it was, like, a big European leader.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, Musar! Yes, exactly! I knew it was, like, a big European leader.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, big news! She's there March 31st to April 1st, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, big news! She's there March thirty first to April first, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Slovenia, Natasa Pirc Musar, will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan from March 31 to April 1, according to Akorda™s press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Talks with President Tokayev, right? Bilateral cooperation, like, all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Talks with President Tokayev, right? Bilateral cooperation, like, all over the place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During her visit, she is scheduled to hold talks with President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, where key issues of bilateral cooperation in trade, economy, investment, transport, and cultural-humanitarian spheres will be discussed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! Trade, economy, investment. Uh, transport, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! Trade, economy, investment. Uh, transport, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...key issues of bilateral cooperation in trade, economy, investment, transport, and cultural-humanitarian spheres will be discussed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...key issues of bilateral cooperation in trade, economy, investment, transport, and cultural-humanitarian spheres will be discussed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! And they're really pushing business ties. A big business forum, um, happening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! And they're really pushing business ties. A big business forum, um, happening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Particular attention will be given to developing business ties. As part of the visit, a Kazakhstan-Slovenia business forum will also take place.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Slovenia's really into ecosystem protection, right? Sustainable development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Slovenia's really into ecosystem protection, right? Sustainable development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Slovenia is actively promoting initiatives for ecosystem protection and sustainable development," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Super cool! It's gonna, like, strengthen relations, especially in ecology.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super cool! It's gonna, like, strengthen relations, especially in ecology.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The visit is expected to be an important step in strengthening bilateral relations, including in the fields of ecology, economy, and humanitarian initiatives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ecology and economy. Yes! A huge step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ecology and economy. Yes! A huge step.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The visit is expected to be an important step in strengthening bilateral relations, including in the fields of ecology, economy, and humanitarian initiatives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Um, did you also catch the bit about Tokayev and President Herzog?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, did you also catch the bit about Tokayev and President Herzog?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: From Israel! Oh, yes! He called him for Nauryz, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: From Israel! Oh, yes! He called him for Nauryz, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held a phone conversation with Israeli President Isaac Herzog. Initiated by the Israeli side, Herzog congratulated Tokayev on the upcoming Nauryz holiday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Herzog's visiting later this year, too!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Herzog's visiting later this year, too!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two leaders also agreed that President Herzog would visit Kazakhstan later this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Kazakhstan's just, like, super busy on the international stage!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Kazakhstan's just, like, super busy on the international stage!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! Yeah, very active right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! Yeah, very active right now.
